CustomField.description: When enabled, the system will clear previous answers before presenting the quiz for retake to respondents.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When enabled, the system will reset or clear the previous answers of the quiz before presenting it for retake to the quiz takers. This ensures a fresh start for each retake and allows quiz takers to provide new responses without any pre-filled or retained answers from their previous attempts.
CustomField.label: Clear Answers on Retake
